content:
I have an identity of the form a = f a, which cannot be rw'd because of dependent type stuff.

simp_rw successfully rewrites, but it does so infinitely, so I only want it to do one pass. I know that simp has an option for this, but the only documentation I could find for it was for lean 3, and simp_rw isn't simp anyway.

simp_rw [h] is essentially simp only [h], so you could do simp (config := {singlePass := true}) only [h]

docs#Lean.Meta.Simp.Config has the config options
ayy, thanks. (For all the help, both here and at MSRI)
zack kenyon has marked this topic as resolved.
